description:
Dashboard with source from 
https://github.com/sysnet4admin/_Book_k8sInfra

Notice:  Has been configured to  work for some diffrerent use cases.

alert.message: Gasco-Api Container CPU  usage is beyond 80% allocated
alert.name: DEV: CPU usage Alert

targets.expr:
sum by (node)(label_replace(instance:node_cpu:ratio + on(instance) group_left(nodename) 
node_uname_info,"node","$1","nodename", "(.+)") ) / sum by (node)(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="cpu"})

((node_memory_MemTotal_bytes  + on(instance) group_left(nodename) 
node_uname_info) - (node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes  + on(instance) group_left(nodename) 
node_uname_info))

title: Kubernetes Workload Dashboard
